desc.en: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.jp: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部全员为了下一届千年大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长莉央出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，遊戲開發部能平安渡过此劫吗？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部全员为了下一届千禧年大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长莉央出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，游戏开发部能平安渡过此劫吗？

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.

The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.

desc.zh_tw: 陽葵去见研討會的部长莉音。两人在谈论先前遊戲開發部与C&C发生的事，并且针对愛麗絲的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于愛麗絲立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来陽葵遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来日鞠遭到某人的袭击。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".

Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.zh_tw: 莉音和陽葵共同策划了遊戲開發部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了愛麗絲的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉音认为愛麗絲是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而陽葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音和阳葵共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉音认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而阳葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

desc.en: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.

desc.zh_tw: 陽葵固守着自己的结论，与莉音产生了严重分歧。莉音试图用AMAS将陽葵困住，但陽葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.

desc.ko: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.
desc.zh_tw: 老师久违地前往遊戲開發部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看愛麗絲玩游戏。愛麗絲在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。

desc.en: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Department, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next game.

desc.zh_tw: 老师受邀来到遊戲開發部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹綠拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.jp: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千禧年大奖。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Aris interrupted the conversation, announcing that Yuzu finally manage to surpass a ten-game winning streak. Momoi explained the so-called "UZQueen Mode" to Sensei. Amazed by Yuzu's exhilarating performance, Aris started trying playing fighting games.
desc.jp: Aris interrupted the conversation, announcing that Yuzu finally manage to surpass a ten-game winning streak. Momoi explained the so-called "UZQueen Mode" to Sensei. Amazed by Yuzu's exhilarating performance, Aris started trying playing fighting games.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲打断了对话，宣布柚子成功超过十连胜。众人都对柚子表示了赞叹。桃井则向老师解释了柚子的所谓“UZQueen模式”，愛麗絲因为向往像柚子一样厉害，于是立刻开始尝试格斗游戏。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Based on her in-depth insight of game features, combined with professional and precise operations, Yuzu defeated the cheater successfully. Everyone was amazed again. Yuzu said such tricks should not be used unless they don't obey the rules.
desc.jp: Based on her in-depth insight of game features, combined with professional and precise operations, Yuzu defeated the cheater successfully. Everyone was amazed again. Yuzu said such tricks should not be used unless they don't obey the rules.

desc.ko: Based on her in-depth insight of game features, combined with professional and precise operations, Yuzu defeated the cheater successfully. Everyone was amazed again. Yuzu said such tricks should not be used unless they don't obey the rules.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子通过对游戏特性的深入了解与专业精准的操作战胜了开挂的对手。众人再一次赞叹无比，而柚子则表示这些小技俩最好还是不要用的好，但在对于不守规则的人身上则任用无妨。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和綠的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用遊戲開發部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让愛麗絲能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的愛麗絲决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.en: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.

Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃井过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹綠的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。

desc.en: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.

desc.en: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲与老师来到了千年校园。愛麗絲说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃井试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。愛麗絲对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议愛麗絲先前进再说。

desc.en: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后愛麗絲为了继续进行冒险而离开。愛麗絲在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到寧瑠在找愛麗絲的消息后，愛麗絲立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到尼禄在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。

desc.en: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.jp: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.

desc.ko: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。愛麗絲突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和愛麗絲交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。爱丽丝突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和爱丽丝交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。爱丽丝突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和爱丽丝交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Aris believed that the further the location, the more events would occur. And indeed they met C&C members Asuna and Karin, who were just on special missions. They exchanged a few and at last Karin mentioned that Neru was looking for Aris.

desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.thai: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.ko: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程師部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来愛麗絲遇见寧瑠，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在愛麗絲也能笑着说寧瑠是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝和千禧年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见尼禄，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说尼禄是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程师部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见宁瑠，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说宁瑠是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见妮露，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说妮露是自己的同伴。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
desc.zh_tw: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: Aris met the three of the Engineering Department. The three said they were out seeking for some new equipments. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.

Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲叫寧瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和愛麗絲到了游戏厅。不出所料，寧瑠不断输给了愛麗絲，尽管愛麗絲已经教了她相当一段时间。寧瑠虽然非常恼火愛麗絲评价她的水平不好，但还是请教愛麗絲连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝叫妮露“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，妮露不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。妮露虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Aris started teaching uneasily. Neru, while cursing, restarted the game again and again, but remained unsuccessful after a long time. Then, Akane came.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲有些不安地开始了教学。寧瑠一边骂着一边不服气地重新开始一次次战局，但即便过了很久还是没成。这时，朱音来了。

desc.en: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.jp: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.

desc.ko: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.zh_tw: 老师对愛麗絲居然不害怕寧瑠感到惊讶，而愛麗絲则表示是因为寧瑠现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解愛麗絲的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但愛麗絲还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师对爱丽丝居然不害怕尼禄感到惊讶，而爱丽丝则表示是因为尼禄现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解爱丽丝的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但爱丽丝还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.

On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.zh_tw: 有一天，老师从貝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往貝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和遊戲開發部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，愛麗絲就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，愛麗絲也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 有一天，老师从真理社接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往真理社部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。

desc.en: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.

desc.zh_tw: 老师到门口时，发现遊戲開發部也受到了邀请。开发部四人表示是为了寻找灵感而来，虽然让一直待在柜子里的柚子相当不舒服。进去后，晴向众人展示了一个奇怪的机器人。

desc.en: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.jp: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.

desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯众人向大家解释，这些机器人来自千年郊外，且数量超过二十台以上。桃井等人大受震撼。貝里塔斯曾尝试使其启动但都以失败告终——就在这时，愛麗絲突然对这个东西有了反应。

desc.en: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.

desc.zh_tw: 与愛麗絲接触后的机器人开始启动，而众人也发现之前装载着G.Bible的游戏机也一并启动。就在众人不知所措时，愛麗絲突然宣布“AL-1S”启动完成，并对在场众人发起攻击。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.

desc.zh_tw: 暴走的愛麗絲失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止愛麗絲。C&C突然现身让愛麗絲昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从綠的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。

desc.en: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.jp: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.thai: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.ko: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.zh_tw: 因未能击倒众人，愛麗絲重新充能光之剑。真紀试图阻拦，但遭愛麗絲反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.jp: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.thai: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.ko: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了愛麗絲。就在寧瑠询问老师事情的前因后果时，綠和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在尼禄询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在宁瑠询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在妮露询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃受伤严重。

desc.en: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.jp: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.thai: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.ko: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.zh_tw: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获綠的联系后，便去找窝在遊戲開發部的愛麗絲。尽管老师给予了安慰，但愛麗絲依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。

desc.en: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.jp: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.thai: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.ko: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.zh_tw: 在与愛麗絲的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏萊的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于愛麗絲的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.

desc.zh_tw: 来到遊戲開發部的是研討會部长莉音。莉音说愛麗絲是「无名诸神的王女」，并说愛麗絲是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉音很平静地在谈论愛麗絲可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。

desc.en: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.jp: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.

No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了愛麗絲的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉音则用游戏作了简单的阐述：愛麗絲是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。

desc.en: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones were partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音向众人道歉，表示让愛麗絲接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为愛麗絲接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。莉音表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.jp: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.

desc.zh_tw: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将愛麗絲的光环破坏掉，即杀死愛麗絲。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉音首先表示了对愛麗絲作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉音叫来了一直在一旁的寧瑠清场。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的尼禄清场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉音首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉音叫来了一直在一旁的宁瑠清场。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的妮露清场。

desc.en: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.jp: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.thai: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.ko: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音表示，C&C本就直属她管理。莉音强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而寧瑠本身也对莉音的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉音很熟悉寧瑠，并早就做好了应对手段。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而尼禄本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉尼禄，并早就做好了应对手段。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音表示，C&C本就直属她管理。莉音强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而宁瑠本身也对莉音的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉音很熟悉宁瑠，并早就做好了应对手段。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而妮露本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉妮露，并早就做好了应对手段。

desc.en: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.jp: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.thai: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.ko: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.zh_tw: 击倒AMAS，寧瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后寧瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，綠和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，愛麗絲做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击倒AMAS，尼禄和时展开了追逐战。但最后尼禄却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击倒AMAS，妮露和时展开了追逐战。但最后妮露却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。

desc.en: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.jp: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.thai: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.ko: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉音无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将寧瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将尼禄打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉音无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将妮露打倒并压制。

desc.en: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.

desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠被压制后，莉音指示AMAS去回收愛麗絲。柚子和綠试图阻止，但遭莉音严厉警告。老师要求莉音住手，莉音反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉音的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师要求莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师要求莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

desc.en: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了愛麗絲的身份。綠试图以工程師部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉音远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。寧瑠在一旁督促愛麗絲不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。愛麗絲会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。尼禄在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程师部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉音远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。宁瑠在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。妮露在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。

desc.en: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.jp: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.

desc.ko: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 送走愛麗絲后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 送走爱丽丝后，千禧年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。

desc.en: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.jp: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.thai: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.ko: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.zh_tw: 老师与遊戲開發部、工程師部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意愛麗絲被带走属于紧急事件，而寧瑠则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。

desc.en: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.jp: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音向愛麗絲阐述愛麗絲实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和綠坚信愛麗絲决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃井出现。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃井出现。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.jp: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.

Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井突然出现，綠立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将愛麗絲救回来。大家都表示了赞同，寧瑠甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，尼禄甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，妮露甚至还表扬了桃大胆敢说的性格。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.

desc.ko: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部正在寻找愛麗絲的行踪。借由乃爱和優香的协助后，调查出愛麗絲已经前往莉音创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，寧瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.

desc.ko: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 众人联系了優香等人，優香听闻愛麗絲被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研討會请求帮助，希望能确认愛麗絲的具体所在地。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.

desc.zh_tw: 不出老师所料，優香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连優香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，優香找到了一个叫做“埃里都”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。優香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.

desc.zh_tw: 工程師部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程師部为何会愿意参与此事，詠葉则表示会长带走愛麗絲的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程師部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千禧年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.

desc.zh_tw: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。綠和柚子简单讲述了季当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。寧瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将愛麗絲救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，遊戲開發部和工程師部趁机救出即可。貝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。尼禄罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。真理社则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。

desc.en: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.jp: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.thai: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.ko: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.zh_tw: 被莉音监禁的陽葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救愛麗絲的遊戲開發部和工程師部遇见了莉音创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 被莉音监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉音创造的AMAS。

desc.en: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.jp: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.

desc.zh_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。

desc.en: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.jp: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.

desc.zh_tw: 陽葵对莉音将愛麗絲绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉音则仍希望陽葵能理解她，并表示陽葵和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.thai: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.ko: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_tw: 季原以为寧瑠会独自去拯救愛麗絲，包含寧瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。遊戲開發部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时原以为尼禄会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含尼禄在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季原以为宁瑠会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含宁瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时原以为妮露会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含妮露在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.thai: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.ko: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.zh_tw: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为寧瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为尼禄会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为宁瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为妮露会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了寧瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的遊戲開發部遇见了莉音的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了尼禄。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了宁瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉音的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了妮露。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。

desc.en: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉音早已察觉到老师和遊戲開發部前来拯救愛麗絲，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止遊戲開發部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉音早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。

desc.en: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.jp: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.thai: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.ko: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.zh_tw: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将寧瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将尼禄与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将宁瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将妮露与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。

desc.en: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.

Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.thai: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.ko: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.zh_tw: 与貝里塔斯的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉音的问候。莉音对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把愛麗絲带回来。莉音见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。

desc.en: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.

desc.zh_tw: 就在莉音笃定自己能获胜时，陽葵在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了貝里塔斯支持的遊戲開發部面临空前的危机，貝里塔斯的副部长千尋在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。

desc.en: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音向陽葵讲述了自己计划的当前进度。陽葵对莉音计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉音的本来目的。陽葵表示莉音“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉音“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉音正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。

desc.zh_tw: 莉音大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是陽葵社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但陽葵则表示她信任她的后辈们。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.jp: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.

desc.zh_tw: 千尋在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。遊戲開發部将此当作契机展开了反击。

desc.en: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.zh_tw: 因为工程師部的活跃表现，遊戲開發部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程師部也因此必须退场了。遊戲開發部在倒下的工程師部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为工程部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为工程部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程部的应援下继续向前迈进。

desc.en: Chihiro's appearance cheered everyone up greatly. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" that came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi asked about the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.

desc.zh_tw: 千尋的出现让大家振奋无比。貝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千尋是怎么做到的，而千尋则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与寧瑠的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；貝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。真理社也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与尼禄的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；真理社保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。真理会也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与妮露的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；真理会保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。

desc.en: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.

desc.zh_tw: 工程師部将自己花了半年和无数资金研发的扬声器兼炸弹投入了使用，结果效果良好，“响度”极佳。然而工程師部此时也因体力不支倒下，只剩下老师与遊戲開發部继续前进。千尋继续为众人带路。

desc.en: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.jp: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.

desc.ko: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.zh_tw: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，遊戲開發部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉音的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉音的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。

desc.en: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data kept updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.jp: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data kept updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.

desc.ko: Neru was entangled with Toki. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.zh_tw: 季与寧瑠纠缠着。季发现寧瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现寧瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉音此时指示季暂时撤退。因为季跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时与尼禄纠缠着。时发现尼禄并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现尼禄的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季与宁瑠纠缠着。季发现宁瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现宁瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉音此时指示季暂时撤退。因为季跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时与妮露纠缠着。时发现妮露并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现妮露的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C.
desc.jp: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C.

desc.zh_tw: 在千尋的指引下，遊戲開發部一行人顺利来到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同样前来的C&C。两队间交换了下具体情况。老师向千尋再次确认情报的准确性，但此刻季突然再次现身。

desc.zh_tw: 莉音表示他们已经改变了计划，允许季使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼机甲。机甲应声从天而降，季也熟练地进入了机甲，启动了系统。C&C立刻开始应敌。

desc.en: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.jp: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.thai: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.ko: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.zh_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和寧瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让寧瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和尼禄找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让尼禄受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和妮露找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让妮露受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。

desc.en: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.

desc.zh_tw: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千尋报告了这点。同时千尋还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的遊戲開發部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。

desc.en: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.jp: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.

desc.zh_tw: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令寧瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉音表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向寧瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.
desc.jp: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.

desc.zh_tw: 老师的意图此时终于表现出来：既然是为地面作战设计，在空中又怎么样呢？事实证明的确如此。虽然只有一瞬间的时间，但柚子已经完全注意到了其弱点所在。

desc.en: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.jp: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.

desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠最终还是没能胜利。莉音指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千尋让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。

desc.en: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.jp: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.thai: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.ko: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.zh_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察寧瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察尼禄与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察妮露与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。

desc.en: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.jp: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.thai: All retreated into a closer building. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.ko: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.zh_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千尋总结，C&C还不够强，而且寧瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程師部已经累趴下了，而遊戲開發部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如綠所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且尼禄尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且妮露尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.en: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity. When Momoi asked how to actually make it, Yuzu reported her discovery.

desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。寧瑠强行支撑着，质问遊戲開發部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对季的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。

desc.en: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage on Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning well when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then formed a plan - with the usage of the "tricks."

desc.zh_tw: 柚子确信寧瑠对季造成了伤害。千尋指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问寧瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，寧瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子确信尼禄对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问尼禄是否是在近距离作战时最优，尼禄表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子确信妮露对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问妮露是否是在近距离作战时最优，妮露表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。

desc.en: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.jp: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.

desc.zh_tw: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了季，代号Double O的寧瑠的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千禧年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的尼禄的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。

desc.en: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.

desc.en: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.

desc.zh_tw: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但寧瑠不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。朱音担心寧瑠身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。

desc.en: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.

She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.ko: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉音授权季发射主炮，将寧瑠打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉音也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。朱音则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。

name.en: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.jp: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.thai: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.ko: As Long As She Got Rescued

desc.en: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium - as well.

desc.zh_tw: 朱音仍然对寧瑠的身体状况非常担心，表示千尋说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但寧瑠并不管这些，她只想救出愛麗絲——而且只要能救出就是胜利。朱音对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。朱音同时还向莉音提到，寧瑠可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜仍然对尼禄的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但尼禄并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，尼禄可是有代号为“OO”——千禧年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音仍然对宁瑠的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但宁瑠并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。朱音对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。朱音同时还向莉音提到，宁瑠可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜仍然对妮露的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但妮露并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，妮露可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。

desc.en: Neru got up from the ground, while Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had talked before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".
